Name: Requiring the department of buildings to create and maintain an assistance and outreach program for compliance with façade inspection requirements
Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring the department of buildings to create and maintain an assistance and outreach program for compliance with façade inspection requirements

History.Description: This Introduction was Introduced by Council
This Introduction was Referred to Comm by Council to the Committee on Housing and Buildings

Summary: This bill would mandate the department of buildings to create and maintain a program that assists building owners in finding labor and financial resources for their façade inspection requirements.
Text:
Be it enacted by the Council as follows:
      
      
      Section 1. Article 103 of chapter 1 of title 28 of the administrative code of the city of New York is amended by adding a new section 28-103.38 to read as follows:
� 28-103.38 Assistance and outreach. The department shall establish and maintain an online technical assistance program providing outreach and guidance to building owners in complying with the requirements of Article 302 of Title 28 of the Administrative Code, and provide building owners with assistance in acquiring the services of qualified exterior wall inspectors and information on loans and financing resources. 
      
      � 2.   This local law takes effect 120 days after it becomes law.
